advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.root.de: Use the altar blessed by the Wenchang deity to collect diverse Chengyu-Idioms — fixed phrases commonly used by Chinese people, which are concise and profound.
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.xiaoxin: Originally meaning reverent and cautious, in modern Chinese mostly used to describe being extremely careful, not daring to be the slightest bit negligent
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.yishier: To kill two birds with one stone.
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.jiuniuy: A single hair from nine oxen, metaphorically meaning an extremely small amount within a vast quantity
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.shuiruj: Describes a state where water and milk blend completely, metaphorically meaning people in perfect harmony or things inseparably integrated
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.ruyudes: Originally depicts a fish gaining water; metaphorically means finding one’s ideal companion or suitable environment, or gaining dependable support
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.congsha: Describes accepting straightforward advice as rapidly and smoothly as flowing water, implying swift, natural acceptance of sound counsel
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.gufangz: To admire oneself as if one were an exceptional flower; metaphorically means considering oneself superior or above the ordinary
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.guangmi: Describes a person’s conduct as upright, frank, and having nothing to conceal
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.ziqiang: An active life attitude of constantly striving to improve oneself and persevering without ever slackening
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.yipiand: Describes a heart of pure sincerity, used to praise a spirit of selfless dedication
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.xinling: Describes the unique ability of master artisans in artistic conception and technical execution
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.danibud: Originally referring to acts like defying superiors or plotting rebellion; now more broadly describes utterly reprehensible acts that severely violate the established order
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.hushuob: Refers to speech that is complete nonsense, utterly groundless and irrational
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.nangyin: Describes using the light from fireflies in a bag and the reflection off snow to illuminate books for diligent study at night; now used metaphorically to mean studying tirelessly day and night
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.beijing: To turn one's back on the village well to leave one's homeland, often implying being forced to depart for distant places due to livelihood constraints
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.fenmode: Originally referring to actors applying makeup and taking the stage to perform; now metaphorically describes malicious individuals disguising themselves to ascend the political stage
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.qiuzhir: To seek knowledge as urgently as a thirsty person desires water; metaphorically means an intense longing for knowledge
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.bigengb: To use the pen as a plow to till the fields of thought, persisting in writing without cease; means engaging in literary creation diligently and without abandonment over the long term
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.minglie: Originally refers to the scouts of the Chu army on the march, who would raise a signal with thatch to sound an alarm upon encountering the enemy; now describes achieving outstanding academic results and securing a top rank
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.meizhon: Describes a situation that is generally excellent but still has a minor flaw
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.maiduhu: To buy a casket containing a pearl, only return the pearl and keep the casket; metaphorically describes poor judgment of priorities, mistaking the secondary for the primary
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.fucizix: A core Confucian virtue where parents should be affectionate and caring towards their children, and children in turn should be dutiful and respectful towards their parents
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.jianrup: Describes something as solid and immovable as a massive rock; metaphorically denotes extreme steadfastness and an unbreakable nature
advancements.jiagureappear.idiom.muzhong: Describes a state where one acts as if no one else is in their sight; metaphorically used to portray someone as extremely arrogant and disdainful of others
advancements.jiagureappear.root.descript: On shells and bones, the marks of time gaze upon the present
advancements.jiagureappear.root.title: Jiagu Reappearance
advancements.jiagureappear.obtain_dictio: Craft a dictionary to search for more information of Jiagu Inscriptions
advancements.jiagureappear.obtain_cangji: Craft the Cangjie Ding-Tripod, a mysterious device that transforms items into characters
Craft the Cangjie Morpher to automate Jiagu Inscription production
Use the Cangjie Ding-Tripod to obtain a Jiagu Inscription item
advancements.jiagureappear.disassemble.d: Use the Character Disassembler to disassemble Jiagu Inscriptions, can disassemble a stack when powered by redstone
advancements.jiagureappear.obtain_auto_d: Craft the Character Auto-disassembler to automatically disassemble Jiagu Inscriptions
advancements.jiagureappear.rub.descripti: Use the Rubbing Table to create items from Jiagu Inscriptions
advancements.jiagureappear.rub.title: First Ink-ression
advancements.jiagureappear.obtain_rubbin: Craft the Rubbing Machine to automate item rubbing
advancements.jiagureappear.obtain_all_co: Collect all types of copper-quality Jiagu Inscription items
advancements.jiagureappear.obtain_taoist: Use the Cangjie Ding-Tripod to transfer enchantments to yellow paper, obtaining an enchanted talisman
advancements.jiagureappear.rub_enchantme: Consume corresponding Jiagu Inscriptions and use the Rubbing Table to transfer talisman enchantments to items
advancements.jiagureappear.obtain_yaowan: Why Is It Made of Wood?
advancements.jiagureappear.obtain_prescr: Consume corresponding Jiagu Inscriptions and use the Yaowang Gourd to transfer status effects to prescriptions
advancements.jiagureappear.trade_with_sc: Use the Rubbing Table to convert a villager into a Scholar, then trade with them
advancements.jiagureappear.obtain_wencha: Craft the Wenchang Altar to display your collected Jiagu Inscriptions, Taoist talismans, or prescriptions
advancements.jiagureappear.obtain_erudit: Craft the Erudite Wenchang Altar to display four items at once
advancements.jiagureappear.obtain_amethy: Obtain the Amethyst Upgrade Smithing Template and smith upgrades for some Jiagu Inscription items
advancements.jiagureappear.obtain_prescr: Obtain the Amethyst Inscription of Yi-Cure or Gu-Parasite. You can open its prescription inventory by pressing X
Please use correct items on it.
Items with custom names are not allowed here.
You‘d better hold some material for engraving in your offhand.
The item in your main hand isn't enchanted.
block.jiagureappear.rubbing_table.wrong_: Please hold some ink in your main hand.
block.jiagureappear.rubbing_table.named_: Items with custom names are not allowed here.
block.jiagureappear.rubbing_table.wrong_: You'd better hold an item suitable for rubbing in your offhand.
block.jiagureappear.rubbing_table.talism: The enchantment on this talisman has faded away
block.jiagureappear.rubbing_table.not_su: The item in your main hand doesn't support the enchantment from your talisman.
block.jiagureappear.rubbing_table.wrong_: The item held in your offhand can't be rubbed.
tips.jiagureappear.wrong_language: Please use Language lzh (文言-華夏) as the game language.
